title: Hôtel du temps
overview: Hôtel du Temps is a new kind of biopic that uses artificial intelligence to recreate long-lost legends and tell them about their lives. For one evening, Thierry Ardisson will bring culture and entertainment stars back to life. It invites viewers to rediscover these cult personalities in their most iconic appearance through interviews, duplexes with other legends, as well as professional, family or historical archives.
